attributes.action: Solve the housing crisis for young adults
attributes.additional_details: The government started an help to buy scheme which gives you a 5000 bonus which is not good enough when buying an house considering the high house prices. Please sign this so we can look after our yourh
attributes.background: Many young people are struggling at taking their first steps in life by purchasing their first houses and cars but the government are doing nothing to solve this crisis which can potentially get worse. Please sign this petition to make the government acctually take action.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to solve the housing crisis for young adults.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
